## Outdated Dependencies Report

The automated dependency check has detected outdated dependencies in the project.

### Action Required

Please review the list of outdated dependencies below and update them as appropriate:

```
<!-- This will be filled automatically by the GitHub Action -->
```

### Updating Dependencies

To update dependencies:

1. Create a new branch: `git checkout -b update-dependencies`
2. Run `npm update` for minor/patch updates or manually update package.json for major updates
3. Test thoroughly to ensure no breaking changes
4. Create a pull request

### Notes

- Major version updates may contain breaking changes
- Review changelogs before updating
- Run all tests after updating dependencies
